data.title: Public access (The University of Manchester Library)
data.meta_description: See the list of databases accessible by external customers for educational purposes for on-site access only.
data.text:
Electronic Resources (access by Alumni and non UoM customers permitted)

The following services can be used by external customers for educational purposes for on-site access only.

Commercial use is prohibited although printing and downloading to a USB memory stick is permitted (subject to the normal copyright laws) users must comply with the terms and conditions stipulated by each publisher / supplier.

See also Copyright and Licensed e-Resources.
